import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import styles from './Pagination.module.css' const Pagination = ({handleNextPage, handleBackPage, currPage, totalPages}) => { return (
{currPage !== 1 ? (
{currPage -1}
):(null)}
{currPage}
{currPage + 1}
) } export default Pagination;
